meanings: treat sth as a departmental operational expense

vlive.korean: [거듭 확인] 어디 부서 장이라고요? [Checks again] What section do you manage again? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 9. “진짜 팬 됐어요” 송민호에게 자극 준 대힙 래퍼의 등장!? 경희대 국제캠 “래빈”
vlive.english: [Checks again] What section do you manage again?

vlive.korean: 이 부서는 어떤 부서인가요? What division is this? 듣기 View video SM CCC LAB : [진리상점│Jinri Market]EP10. 진리상점입니다.
오늘 부서 회식이군요. You have a department dinner today. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #밤황치열시 #part.3 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: You have a department dinner today.

vlive.korean: 그래서 그것마저 부서버리겠다? So, you want to break it? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 오늘, 우리☺️
vlive.english: So, you want to break it?

vlive.korean: 두 분이 부서가 다릅니까? Are you two in a different team? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 스페셜시즌 EP60_PPL 봇들의 반란??(ft. 모델 욕심)
vlive.english: Are you two in a different team?

examples.korean: Many departments have overspent their budgets this year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 올해에는 많은 부서들이 예산보다 초과 지출했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many departments have overspent their budgets this year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 부서를 활성화할 방안을 찾고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She made herself indispensable to the department. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자기가 그 부서에 없어서는 안 되는 사람이 되도록 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She made herself indispensable to the department. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a fully staffed department 듣기 Add to Wordbook 직원이 다 차 있는 부서 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a fully staffed department Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They tried to ensure uniformity across the different departments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 서로 다른 부서들 간의 균일성을 확보하기 위해 애썼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They tried to ensure uniformity across the different departments. Add to Wordbook
